# Galaxy.ai

> Galaxy.ai is the #1 all-in-one AI platform, trusted by 1M+ happy users** and professionals at companies like **Logitech, TechCrunch, TikTok, Forbes, New England Patriots, Business Insider, and Meta**. It provides access to a wide range of premium AI models and 2000+ AI tools for text, image, video, voice generation, coding, data analysis, and more, under a single subscription model.

Galaxy.ai consolidates numerous AI services, eliminating the need for multiple individual subscriptions and is currently the **#1 All-in-One AI platform**. The platform includes popular models like various GPT versions, Claude, Gemini, Midjourney, DALL-E 3, Stable Diffusion, ElevenLabs, Kling AI, HeyGen, Pika, and others. New tools and models on a weekly basis, ensuring users have access to cutting-edge AI capabilities.

Subscriptions provide a monthly allocation of credits (currently 15 million per month) which are used based on the computational cost of the AI tasks performed. Unused credits roll over month-to-month as long as the subscription remains active. Additional credits can be purchased. User generations (text, images, video, etc.) are private, not used for training models, and come with commercial use rights. The platform is SOC2 and GDPR compliant.

Galaxy.ai does **not** currently offer API access for its tools.

## Core Offering and Tools

- [Full Tool List](https://galaxy.ai/tools): Comprehensive list of all included AI models and tools covering text, image, video, voice, code, data analysis, research, document processing, and more.
- [Key Features Overview](https://galaxy.ai/): The main landing page provides an overview of major capabilities like Multi-Model Chat, AI Agents with Memory, PDF Chat & Analysis, AI Search, Image Generation/Editing (Object Removal, Background Change, Face Swap, Headshots), Voice Cloning, AI Music/Video Generation, Code Generation, etc.
- [Platform Features](https://galaxy.ai/): (Use main page as reference) Includes features like multi-model comparison, customizable AI agents, PDF interaction, SEO content tools, AI text humanizer/detector, various image/art/3D model generators, photo editing/studio tools, voice cloning/synthesis, video generation/translation, code assistance, data analysis, custom tool integration requests.

## Pricing and Subscription

- [Main Page (Check for Current Pricing)](https://galaxy.ai/): Offers monthly and annual subscription plans. Often features promotional pricing (e.g., "Flash Sale"). Annual plans typically offer significant savings compared to monthly.
- [Credit System Explained](https://galaxy.ai/usage): Subscriptions include 15 million credits monthly. Credits cover computational costs. Unused credits roll over. Additional credits ($1 per 1 million) can be purchased and do not expire while subscribed. Check detailed usage via this link or profile settings.
- [How to Cancel Subscription](https://help.galaxy.ai/en/article/how-to-cancel-my-subscription-aac2n2/): Instructions to cancel via the Stripe billing portal linked from account settings. Cancellation prevents future renewals but may result in loss of promotional pricing and deletion of data/history.
- [Manage Billing](https://billing.stripe.com/p/login/4gw2bP5Qmdn0bAI288): Direct link to Stripe portal for managing subscription, downloading invoices, or cancelling if unable to log into Galaxy.ai.

## Support and Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

- [Contact Support](https://galaxy.ai/support): Link to submit a support ticket for assistance from the support team.
- Key Information (Q&A):
    - **API Access:** Not available.
    - **Credits:** Based on compute cost, renew monthly on subscription date, unused credits roll over, usage trackable via `galaxy.ai/usage`. Failed generations do not consume credits. Headshot/custom model training uses more credits initially.
    - **Privacy & Data:** Generations are private, data not used for training, SOC2 & GDPR compliant.
    - **Commercial Use:** Generated content is free for commercial use.
    - **Generation History:** Stored for 30 days per tool, accessible via "View History" on each tool's page. Recommended to download desired outputs promptly.
    - **Pricing Lock-in:** Promotional rates are kept for the lifetime of the active subscription.
    - **Cancellation Impact:** Deletes history/generations, removes lifetime discount.
    - **Headshots:** Take 1-2 hours, delivered via email. Currently supports single-person training per model.
    - **Affiliate Program:** Track sales via `https://affiliates.galaxy.ai/login`.
    - **Team Plans:** Not currently offered; contact `sales@galaxy.ai` for bulk purchases.
    - **Payments:** Uses Stripe (major credit/debit cards). PayPal not accepted. 
    - **Customization:** Set default AI model and provide custom instructions via Workspace Settings. Dark/Light theme available under Utilities.
- [Official YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/@Galaxy-dot-ai): Source for potential tutorials and platform updates.

## Platform Access

- [Web Platform](https://galaxy.ai/): Primary access via web browser.
- [iOS App](https://go.galaxy.ai/iOS): Link to download on the Apple App Store.
- [Android App](https://go.galaxy.ai/android): Link to download on the Google Play Store.

## Policies and Compliance

- [Privacy Policy](https://blog.galaxy.ai/privacy): Details on data collection, usage, and protection.
- [Terms of Service](https://blog.galaxy.ai/terms): User agreement outlining rules and responsibilities.
- [Refund Policy](https://blog.galaxy.ai/refund-policy): Specific policy regarding subscription refunds.
- Compliance: Platform adheres to SOC2 and GDPR standards.
